item.title: CVE-2021-21002|2024-08-03T17:53:23.033Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20comserver
item.description: In Phoenix Contact FL COMSERVER UNI in versions < 2.40 a invalid Modbus exception response can lead to a temporary denial of service.
